name: CMIOExtensionDeviceSource
desc: A protocol for objects that act as device sources.

items.name: var availableProperties: Set<CMIOExtensionProperty>
items.desc: A set of available properties that a device provides.

items.name: func deviceProperties(forProperties: Set<CMIOExtensionProperty>) -> CMIOExtensionDeviceProperties
items.desc: Retrieves the state of device properties.

items.name: func setDeviceProperties(CMIOExtensionDeviceProperties)
items.desc: Sets the state of device properties.
